org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator

Class PortfolioEqualityConstraintSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator.PortfolioEqualityConstraintSettings

  • public class PortfolioEqualityConstraintSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    PortfolioEqualityConstraintSettings holds the Parameters required to generate the Mandatory Constraints for the Portfolio.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
